alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 11:39PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Phelps, Gosper and northern Furnas Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1139 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Indianola, or 15 miles northeast of McCook, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cambridge around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Smithfield and Bertrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
